name: safe-agent-v4
description: A risk-first "safety exoskeleton" for Uniswap v4 agents: - Funds sit in a SafeAgentVault smart contract. - Each agent address has a risk profile (limits, allowed pools, modes). - Off-chain rule-based agents send trade intents. - The vault enforces on-chain guardrails before interacting with Uniswap v4.
